parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Unit Control

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Order the given unit to follow the given other unit (via the radio).

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> unitName '''commandFollow''' followedunit

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unitName: [[Object]] or [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> followedunit: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_soldier1 [[commandFollow]] _soldier2</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[doFollow]], [[formationLeader]], [[formLeader]], [[isFormationLeader]], [[leader]], [[selectLeader]], [[setLeader]]
</value></part></template>
